title: DJ PAUL KOMTV #95 A Person of Interest: The Movie trailer
author: DJ Paul KOM TV
comment: This will be the first album I bought since 09. I'm copping the bundle with the sauce/rub/dvd/cd/shirt. I can't wait to hear the cd, watch the movie and try the sauce/rub. I know DJ Paul aint going to let me down. Thank you for continuing to bring it. It's crazy to think yall still going strong all these years later!
best cd /dvd combo I've ever baught
"DO I LOOK LIKE GANGSTA RAPPER TO U???" lol Paul that shit hilarious
if this album is anything like the "For I Have Siinned" mixtape, then im definetely coppin this when it drops
I feel like this movie has a deeper meaning and the Gucci and meeting on twitter was a metaphor
description: DJ Paul's official trailer for A Person of Interest: The Movie - Get the full movie with A Person of Interest album! Order CD and DVD here: http://www.selectohits.com/index.php?... and on iTunes http://itunes.apple.com/us/album/a-pe...
